code:
%% Class Diagram Template
%% Replace with your actual data model

classDiagram
    class User {
        +String id
        +String email
        +String name
        +DateTime createdAt
        +DateTime updatedAt
        +login() bool
        +logout() void
        +updateProfile(data) User
    }

    class Organisation {
        +String id
        +String name
        +String slug
        +Plan plan
        +getMembers() List~User~
        +addMember(user) void
        +removeMember(user) void
    }

    class Project {
        +String id
        +String name
        +String description
        +Status status
        +DateTime deadline
        +getTasks() List~Task~
        +addTask(task) void
        +archive() void
    }

    class Task {
        +String id
        +String title
        +String description
        +Priority priority
        +Status status
        +User assignee
        +assign(user) void
        +complete() void
    }

    class Comment {
        +String id
        +String content
        +User author
        +DateTime createdAt
        +edit(content) void
        +delete() void
    }

    %% Relationships
    User "1" --> "*" Organisation : belongs to
    Organisation "1" --> "*" Project : owns
    Project "1" --> "*" Task : contains
    User "1" --> "*" Task : assigned to
    Task "1" --> "*" Comment : has
    User "1" --> "*" Comment : writes

    %% Enums
    class Status {
        <<enumeration>>
        DRAFT
        ACTIVE
        COMPLETED
        ARCHIVED
    }

    class Priority {
        <<enumeration>>
        LOW
        MEDIUM
        HIGH
        CRITICAL
    }

    class Plan {
        <<enumeration>>
        FREE
        PRO
        ENTERPRISE
    }
